metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5866 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The autocomplete feature in the E-Mail share dialog in ownCloud Serverbefore 8.1.11, 8.2.x before 8.2.9, 9.0.x before 9.0.7, and 9.1.x before9.1.3 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
